item.title: Praxisprojekt SS2015: Treasure Map
item.description:
Foto by RachelC

Projekt Goal: Develop a Web & Mobile App to plan little explorations either by foot, bike or car including pre-selected locations or locations suggested by peers.

Offered as a (Praxisprojekt for IMI Bachelors)[https://imi-bachelor.htw-berlin.de/studium/projekte/projekte-im-sommersemester-2015//]. See the scenarios and user stories below for a rough idea what the apps should support.
